rule: The output exceeds 80 words in total length, containing more than 80 words.
input: A snow-covered village in winter, smoke rising from chimneys, children playing.
output: A snow-covered traditional Finnish village bathed in golden winter sunlight with smoke drifting lazily from woodstoves; children gleefully skating and building snowmen amidst crisp white scenery, a serene and cozy scene filled with happy innocence.
complianceText:
The chatbot output is a single paragraph and appears to transform a description into a prompt for generating an AI photo. The subjects (a traditional Finnish village and children), their characteristics (snow-covered, bathed in golden winter sunlight, smoke from woodstoves, children skating and building snowmen), the timing and lighting (winter sunlight), and the background (crisp white scenery) are effectively represented. The final part of the description ("a serene and cozy scene filled with happy innocence") conveys a feeling the image should evoke. The description does not exceed 80 words. Therefore, it complies with the chatbot description requirements.

OK
